title: Eight truckloads of food items handed over to Afghan authorities
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 13 (APP): Eight truckloads carrying food packages on Saturday were handed over to the Afghan authorities at Zeroline Torkham border crossing under Pak-Afghan Cooperation Forumâ€™s arrangements.
The package was sponsored/donated by Khubaib Foundation and contained food items of rice, cooking oil, beans and sugar.
On the occasion, Ashfaq Ahmed, Director Relief Khubaib Foundation and Ansar Abbas, Senior Programme Manager from Pakistan side while Rehmat Ullah (Admin Finance Kabul) from the Afghan side were present.
